Fallen In Love

15 Nov 2016 FALLEN IN LOVE

FALLEN IN LOVE

When the whole world was talking about love I was wondering what it is I loved my parents I loved my friends too But this what people…

When the whole world was talking about love
I was wondering what it is
I loved my parents
I loved my friends too
But this what people talked about was different
I knew not what it is.

A Love Story

10 Oct 2016 A Love Story

A Love Story

Far away by distance we are Staring at the phone screen We are just having a message war Saying things which we don’t even mean

Far away by distance we are
Staring at the phone screen
We are just having a message war
Saying things which we don’t even mean

Crossroads of Life

02 Oct 2016
Standing at the crossroads I wonder how I got here Walking was never easy Destination I never care

Standing at the crossroads
I wonder how I got here
Walking was never easy
Destination I never care
